Name: colon adenoma
Definition: A colonic benign neoplasm that has_material_basis_in epithelial tissue with glandular origin.

Name: colonic lymphangioma
Definition: A tauopathy that is characterized by memory lapses

Name: obsolete colonic ganglioneuroma
Definition: A tauopathy that is characterized by memory lapses

Name: sigmoid neoplasm
Definition: A noninfectious dermatoses of eyelid that is characterized by eczema

Name: colon neuroendocrine neoplasm
Definition: A vaginal carcinosarcoma derives_from the glands that line the uterus.
